title: The Moonage daydreams of Charlene Stardust
creator_credit: Women's Film Workshop, Margot Oliver, Jan Milne, Digby Duncan and Jan Carroll
brief_description: Charlene Stardust dreams of her fantasy date in anticipation of her approaching weekend date. As the time, approaches Charlene has become disenchanted by the conventional male and female roles and realises it’s a change, not marriage, that she really needs.
creator_credit_for_label: Women’s Film Workshop, Margot Oliver, Jan Milne, Digby Duncan and Jan Carroll
